channel.title: Pod on the Apex
channel.itunes:author: Pratyush Nalam, Aniket Mohan
channel.description: Pratyush and Aniket bring the F1 circus to your screen! New episodes every Wednesday.

item.title: Welcome to Pod on the Apex!
item.description: Are you an F1 fan? Does the sound of the engine revving excite you behind your wildest dreams? Well, you have come to the right place! Introducing #PodOnTheApex! Pratyush and Aniket bring the F1 circus with all its action on and off the track right to your screen! Get ready for an insightful and entertaining discussion of what to look forward in the 2025 season and how these 2 gearheads started their obsession with this adrenaline-filled sport!

item.title: Ranking the 2025 F1 Liveries!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, we discuss the F1 75 extravaganza and then rank all the TEN 2025 F1 liveries! Join us, Pratyush and Aniket, for a whirlwind and fun discussion and watch us rank our favorites! Do you agree with our rankings? Let us know!
